item.description: CSS Tricks # CSS can be used to trick a user into exposing information such as embedded pixel values by making visual changes that are affected by the embed. Previously it was possible to use getComputedStyle() to detect this difference but now browsers prevent this by always returing values as if the link was visted and limiting what styles can be applyed using the selector.
